markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Juspix Rammel](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1508)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 42

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 37
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 14">[Juspix Rammel](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1508)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 42</row>

**Perception** +27; [keen eyes](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=5)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6), [Halfling](/Languages.aspx?ID=7), [Skald](/Languages.aspx?ID=42), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +27, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +27, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +27, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +27, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +27

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -1

**Dex** +5

**Con** +2

**Int** +5

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Ceaseless Shadows** Juspix doesn't need concealment or cover to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) or [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63). If he has lesser cover from creatures, he instead has cover and can [Take Cover](/Actions.aspx?ID=90). If he has cover from creatures, he instead has greater cover.

**Items**
_[bracers of armor II](/Equipment.aspx?ID=416)_, _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [filcher's fork](/Weapons.aspx?ID=51)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 33 

**Fort** +22 

**Ref** +27 

**Will** +27 

</row>

**HP** 240

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_filcher's fork_ +25 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=172), [deadly 1d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d4+3 piercing plus 3d6 cold

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_filcher's fork_ +25 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=172), [deadly 1d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 2d4+3 piercing plus 3d6 cold

**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 35, attack +27
- **Cantrips (7th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307)
- **1st**
[Alarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=7), [Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Jump](/Spells.aspx?ID=167)
- **2nd**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Glitterdust](/Spells.aspx?ID=136) (×2), [Obscuring Mist](/Spells.aspx?ID=210)
- **3rd**
[Earthbind](/Spells.aspx?ID=94) (×2), [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)
- **4th**
[Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6) (×3), [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128)
- **5th**
[Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Wall of Ice](/Spells.aspx?ID=364) (×2)
- **6th**
[Baleful Polymorph](/Spells.aspx?ID=17), [Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33), [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344), [Blinding Fury](/Spells.aspx?ID=672)
- **7th**
[Dragon Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=88), [Eclipse Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=96), [Energy Aegis](/Spells.aspx?ID=100), [Unfettered Pack](/Spells.aspx?ID=350)

**Witch Hexes** DC 35, 3 Focus Points
- **Cantrips (7th)**
[Clinging Ice](/Spells.aspx?ID=793)
- **7th**
[Cackle](/Spells.aspx?ID=792), [Elemental Betrayal](/Spells.aspx?ID=797), [Life Boost](/Spells.aspx?ID=799), [Phase Familiar](/Spells.aspx?ID=804), [Personal Blizzard](/Spells.aspx?ID=803)

**Familiar**   Juspix's familiar is a wildcat named Ontiok. Ontiok has a Speed of 40 feet, [darkvision](/Familiars.aspx?ID=5), and the [damage avoidance (Reflex)](/Familiars.aspx?ID=4) familiar ability. Juspix has the [lifelink](/Familiars.aspx?ID=16) and [spell delivery](/Familiars.aspx?ID=18) master abilities.

</column>
name: Juspix Rammel
